problem_names:
lemma map_of_tabulate:  
  "map_of (map (\<lambda>x. (x, f x)) xs) x \<noteq> None \<longleftrightarrow> x \<in> set xs"

lemma map_of_tabulate_simp:
  "map_of (map (\<lambda>x. (x, f x)) xs) x = (if x \<in> set xs then Some (f x) else None)"

lemma map_equal:
  "dom m = dom m' \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>x. x \<in> dom m \<Longrightarrow> m x = m' x) \<Longrightarrow> m = m'"

lemma map_reduce:
  assumes "dom m = {a} \<union> B"
  shows "\<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x \<in> B. m x = m' x)"
translations:
lemma map_of_tabulate:  
  "map_of (map (\<lambda>x. (x, f x)) xs) x \<noteq> None \<longleftrightarrow> x \<in> set xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (map_of (map (\<lambda>x. (x, f x)) xs) x \<noteq> None) =
    (x \<in> set xs)
by (induct xs) auto

lemma map_of_tabulate_simp:
  "map_of (map (\<lambda>x. (x, f x)) xs) x = (if x \<in> set xs then Some (f x) else None)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. map_of (map (\<lambda>x. (x, f x)) xs) x =
    (if x \<in> set xs then Some (f x) else None)
by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) comp_eq_dest_lhs map_of_map_restrict restrict_map_def)

lemma dom_map_update:
  "dom (m (k \<mapsto> v)) = dom m \<union> {k}"
by simp

lemma map_equal:
  "dom m = dom m' \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>x. x \<in> dom m \<Longrightarrow> m x = m' x) \<Longrightarrow> m = m'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>dom m = dom m';
     \<And>x. x \<in> dom m \<Longrightarrow> m x = m' x\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> m = m'
by fastforce

lemma map_reduce:
  assumes "dom m = {a} \<union> B"
  shows "\<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x \<in> B. m x = m' x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
proof (cases "a \<in> B")

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. a \<in> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
 2. a \<notin> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
case True

proof (state)
this:
  a \<in> B

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. a \<in> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
 2. a \<notin> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> B
  dom m = {a} \<union> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
by (metis insert_absorb insert_is_Un)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<notin> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<notin> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
case False

proof (state)
this:
  a \<notin> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<notin> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
with assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  dom m = {a} \<union> B
  a \<notin> B
have "dom (m (a := None)) = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = (m (a := None)) x)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  dom m = {a} \<union> B
  a \<notin> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dom (m(a := None)) = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = (m(a := None)) x)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  dom (m(a := None)) = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = (m(a := None)) x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<notin> B \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  dom (m(a := None)) = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = (m(a := None)) x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>m'. dom m' = B \<and> (\<forall>x\<in>B. m x = m' x)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
